DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this randomized double-blind cross over clinical trial is to investigate effectiveness of different routes of applications (intramuscular and submucous at the site of surgery) and doses (4 mg and 8 mg) of Dexamethasone on swelling, trismus, pain and quality of life after lower third molar surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Dexamethasone in Lower Third Molar Surgery
DOC.criteria: Healthy patients (ASA I) Bilateral symmetrically impacted lower third molars according to PelGregory's and Winter's classification Heavy tobacco smokers Drug and / or alcohol abusers
